headline: Smart City Platforms Market Surges to $39.52 billion by 2030 - Dominated by IBM (US), Siemens (Germany), Cisco (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Nov. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart City Platforms Market will grow from USD 24.51 billion in 2025 to USD 39.52 billion by 2030 at a compounded annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.0% during the forecast period. There is growing demand for efficient energy and resource management solutions, with smart platforms playing a critical role in optimizing utilities and promoting sustainability.
